Name: tha-groupfromthesoc-lad
Author: Group From The Society Of Graduates Of Thai Universities And Institutes

Translations.Text: Thæ̂cring reā dị̂ pra thā nxạl keā sạr kæ̀ cêā læ̂w
dạngnận cêā cng lah̄mād pheụ̄̀x phracêā k̄hxng cêā læa cng cheụ̄xd s̄ạtw̒ phlī
thæ̂cring ṣ̄ạtrū k̄hxng cêā nận k̄heā pĕn p̄hū̂ t̄hūk tạdk̄hād
